Stipulate.definition: to make an agreement or covenant about something
Stipulate.origin: [Latin stipulatus , past participle of stipulari to exact (as from a prospective debtor) a formal guarantee when making an oral contract]

2.definition: to establish (procedure or evidence) by agreement during a proceeding [defendantthat evidence was sufficient to support his conspiracy conviction ""] [based onfacts]
